fields.name: PDC Production and Repair
fields.description: Responsible for production and repair operations in the PDC facility. Manages manufacturing processes, quality control, and maintenance activities.

fields.name: Roller Cones
fields.description: Specialized production unit focused on roller cone manufacturing and assembly. Handles precision components and quality assurance.

fields.name: Infiltration
fields.description: Production department responsible for infiltration system manufacturing, testing, and installation support.

fields.name: Quality
fields.description: Quality assurance and control department. Ensures all products and services meet company standards and regulatory requirements.

fields.name: Safety
fields.description: Health and safety department. Develops and implements safety policies, conducts training, and monitors workplace safety compliance.

fields.name: Human Resource
fields.description: Human Resources department. Manages recruitment, employee relations, training, payroll, and organizational development.

fields.name: Sales
fields.description: Sales and marketing department. Responsible for customer acquisition, relationship management, and revenue generation.

fields.name: Requirements
fields.description: Requirements management department. Handles planning, procurement, inventory management, and supply chain coordination.

fields.name: Logistics
fields.description: Logistics and distribution department. Manages shipping, warehouse operations, and delivery coordination.

fields.name: Technical
fields.description: Technical support and IT department. Provides technical support, system administration, and infrastructure management.
